name: dscopyjs
description: dscopy.js is an Datasource copy library for JavaScript and Node.js. It features any datasource to any datasource copier. This take take any datasource as input and create insert/delete/update statements that can be run on any target datasource
author: Ashwin Rayaprolu <ashwin.rayaprolu@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ashwinrayaprolu1984)

scripts.coverage:
istanbul cover _mocha -- test --recursive; echo "
Coverage report is available at ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html"
